mapper.insert: insert into chat_list (seq,mentor,mentee) values (chat_list_seq.nextval,#{mentor, jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{mentee, jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.update: update chat_list set yn = 'Y' where seq = #{seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: delete from chat_list where seq = #{seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: select chat_list.*,mentor.nickname mentorname,mentee.nickname menteename from chat_list join members mentee on chat_list.mentee = mentee.code join members mentor on chat_list.mentor = mentor.code where mentor = #{loginID, jdbcType=NUMERIC} or mentee = #{loginID, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
select count(*) from chat_list where seq = #{seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC} and ( mentor = #{code, jdbcType=NUMERIC} or mentee = #{code, jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
select * from chat_list where mentor = #{mentor, jdbcType=NUMERIC} and mentee = #{mentee, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
